Text.Page:
The argons are increasing their activity in the {@Rgn:50004}. If the argons can regenerate their lost forces, we're finished.

{@LinkCreature:250#1016} is on-site. We're sending you to help him.

Some argons are built for battle, but others, like the suulvir harvester, support the argon war machine by mining iteris shards.

If we cut through their support structure, the rest may come tumbling down.

I've never seen bigger shards. Great work.

The war effort can use these. Thanks.
You'll need to kill the suulvir harvesters to collect their shards.
